title: Question regarding Poppy's ult.
body: In the spotlight it says that her R knocks back enemy champions towards their own 'nexus' does this mean that it is now possible to essentially knock a whole team out of their own fountain towards their nexus?

replies.body: Nope, it was just Phreak's paraphrasing. The official ability description says summoning platform. Read more [here](http://2.bp.blogspot.com/--6H4CqRsxM4/VlTR8fYFw_I/AAAAAAAAIus/0RfOlnIXCsQ/s1600/poppyr.jpg).
